_header: Jesu of Nazareth the king of Jews
Note: For other texts of the Charter of Christ see 1913, 2859, 6650, 6768, 6769.
Title(s): Magna carta libertatis & remissionis generalis; Charter of Christ
_description: ‘Magna carta libertatis & remissionis generalis’ — ten quatrains (abab)

CULAdd6686.First Lines:
[I]hesu of naȝareth þe kyng of jewesTo all þat er
                    boþ ying & olde…
CULAdd6686.Last Lines:
…My grette sele is sette þer tillTo werre man froo his
                    dedely foose
